Monthly Roundup: March '25

What I Read

  • Babel, R.F Kuang Did not go beyond Chapter Eight. The book was too long and kept repeating itself.

  • The Eight of Swords, John Dickson Carr

What I Played

  • Good Coffee, Great Coffee: After two tries in February when it launched and earlier in the month, I was finally able to install and play it. Was it worth the wait? I'd say so.
